name: Goblin's Almanac
description:
Try not to be fooled by the goblin and his suspicious almanac. Verify the information he wrote for you and follow the appraisal's advices to avoid the CURS3.

A terrible CURS3 awaits those not graced by  NUMB3R THR33.
As the goblin is a professional deceiver, you will have to  think carefully  what 3 potions you buy from the store. Not every rule written on the almanac is true or good for your purse. 
Hopefully, Grazka Smartdoc, the appraisal, will throw some hints. Her sayings are worth listening and... who knows? You might be able to run the potion seller out of stock!

Controls:

-Press TAB to open the almanac or click on it.
-Click on the potion to select it and confirm pressing BUY or TAX&SELL.
-The chart below shows how to read almanac's symbols. *Rule working as an example is refering to red colored medium sized triangle shaped potions.
